column4: Built and designed to with stand both outdoor and indoor use with IP54 & IK08；Smart charging control via the smart phone app；Daylight readable 7" TFT screen provides a clear, simple charging instruction；Integrated RFID reader, supports authorization management and switchs charging modes；Built-in Wi-Fi/Bluetooth, Ethernet & Cellular connectivity；Over current, over voltage, under voltage, surge, short circuit, ground fault, over temperature, leakage, and sticking of relay detection；Fully OCPP 1.6 compliant and completely compatible with any OCPP management platform worldwide；Support OTA updated
